game.name: Shopping For Masquerade
game.description:
Belle and Cinderella have made a plan to attend the Disney newyear masquerade. This is a big occasion, so they do want to make a compromise on their looks. Nobody is there to go with them to shop for their desirable products. Stay with them to buy the trendy and fashionable outfits in Shopping For Masquerade! They both need your fashion abilities, so shop with them and select some classy and exclusive dresses for the girls. 
Choose the girl you want to shop with and then get ready to dive into the unlimited fun of shopping! Visit the clothes and gloves to shop for some exclusive and lovely dresses for the girl or move to the store where the unlimited variety of shoes and hairstyles are available for you in this one of the best girls games! You will have cash of $1000 in your hand for each girl, so buy products accordingly. Give her a nice hairstyle first and then choose a matching mask in this html5 shopping game! 
Do not forget to choose a nice pair of shoes that look fabulous on your girl. Give your princess an elegant top and combine it with a designer bottom that will be enough to make her look fabulous on any occasion! You also find out an exclusive variety of hand gloves in the shopping store. For every product, a rate is fixed, so check it first before making a final deal. Choose the right outfits to make these princesses feel on you! Have more fun in our top dressing games for kids!
